body_html: Dealing with irregular shapes is quite common. I wish there is a way to use a reasonably good cudnn algorithm without wasting too much time in warm up, but I don't know how this can be done. Maybe allow users to dump/load the autotune cache? Following some heuristics when autotune is disabled?

body: Dealing with irregular shapes is quite common. I wish there is a way to use a reasonably good cudnn algorithm without wasting too much time in warm up, but I don't know how this can be done. Maybe allow users to dump/load the autotune cache? Following some heuristics when autotune is disabled?
